title: MR.SIGA Premium Microfibre Cleaning Cloths for Lens, Eyeglasses, Screens, Tablets, Glasses, 12 Pack, 6 x 7 inches (15 x 18 cm), Navy/Gray
features: PREMIUM MICROFIBER CLOTHS-made of high quality, tightly woven microfiber material, attracts fine dust, great for cleaning delicate electronic devices.

ULTRA SOFT MATERIAL & SCRATCH FREE-Touches extremely soft, lint free, 100% safe for cleaning dust, streaks, smudge, fingerprints, oils, marks from your screens, eyeglasses, lenses, binoculars, telescopes, jewelry and other delicate surfaces.
EFFECTIVE CLEANING-MR.SIGA ultra fine microfiber cloths ensure excellent results which improve your cleaning performance and leaves behind no fine dust or lint on surfaces.
REUSABLE & LONG LASTING- Easy to wash and quick drying. Hand wash with water, no detergent or fabric softener, do not bleach, air dry only.

COMPACT SIZE & INDIVIDUALLY PACKED- Each cloth measures 6 x 7 inches (15 x 18 cm), Pack of 12 (6 x Navy, 6 x Gray). Each one comes individually and neatly packed in the transparent bag to keep the cloths clean and well organized.
